# The `AMDGPUAnnotateUniformValues.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass adds amdgpu.uniform metadata to IR values so this information can be used during instruction selection. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This pass adds amdgpu.uniform metadata to IR values so this information can be used during instruction selection.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">    setUniformMetadata(PtrI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We&#39;re tracking up to the Function boundaries, and cannot go beyond because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of FunctionPass restrictions. We can ensure that is memory not clobbered</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for memory operations that are live in to entry points only.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!isEntryFunc)</Highlight></CodeLine>
